When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the training that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy groceries wholesale and a cooler.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 42 años de edad, es soltero, no tiene hijos dependientes. Pedro vive con su madre en el caserío de Ñuruñupe del distrito de San Felipe, el caserío de Ñuruñupe es un caserío mediano con aspiraciones a superarse, el cual se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. En dicho distrito sus actividades principales son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Pedro se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de maíz propios, dichos productos son comercializados en el distrito de San Felipe y se encuentran en muy buen estado, Pedro cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en la agricultura, además se dedica al cultivo de pan llevar como son yuca, frejol, etc. los cuales son para su consumo, cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El destino del crédito es para la compra de abono y fertilizantes pues desea realizar el mantenimiento de su cultivo de maíz para poder adquirir una utilidad aceptable para que mejore su producción y de esta manera poder venderlo a un mejor precio, aumentando sus ingresos y mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro is 42 years old and is single.  He does not have dependent children.  He lives with his mother in the village of Ñuruñupe in the district of San Felipe.  The village of Ñuruñupe is medium sized and its principles activities include agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

Pedro works in agriculture, and he has his own corn crops, selling his products in the district of San Felipe.  His crops are in very good health.  Pedro has more than 10 years of experience in this field.  He also grows other types of crops such as yucca, beans, etc.  He grows these for food.  He has very good personal and work references.  This loan will be used to buy fertilizer and feed because he wants to keep his corn crop healthy and be able to acquire acceptable tools for improving his production.  In this well he will sell more at a better price, raising his income and improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and feed to keep his corn crop healthy and be able to acquire acceptable tools for improving production.

loans.name: Ersi

texts.en:
Ersi, a 25-year-old married father of a three-year-old, provides transportation services, earning roughly $500/month; the whitish vehicle in the background, is the one he uses for the business. He lives in a little town in central northern Albania. 

Ersi's father, who resides in another village, was ill and required immediate surgery. He had no money to pay for it, so Ersi paid for the surgery and other related expenses. To cover these costs, Ersi borrowed from friends and is now requesting a loan from you to repay them.

loans.use: to pay for the medical/surgical expenses of his ill father

loans.name: Anali

texts.es:
Anali tiene 30 años de edad, vive en casa familiar con su cónyuge y su menor hijo en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de animales menores como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 05 años. Además genera otros ingresos por alquiler de mototaxi y su cónyuge se desempeña como mototaxista. El destino del préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, con esto Anali espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que le va a generar mayores ingresos que van a permitirle mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Anali is 30 years old. She lives in her family home with her spouse and her young son in a community dedicated to commerce, agriculture and livestock. It is located in the district of Cayaltí, province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of  Peru.

She sells small animals such as chickens, ducks, turkeys and more. She has done this activity for more than 5 years. She also generates more income by renting out a motorcycle taxi, and her husband works as a motorcycle taxi driver. The loan will be used to buy a larger quantity of animals as well as balanced feed to fatten them. With this, Anali hopes to offer a wider variety of animals to her customers, which will generate more income, allowing for a better quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of animals as well as balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Martha Genoveva

texts.es:
Martha Genoveva tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con dos hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia, en el distrito de Nueva Arica, una zona rural que ha permitido desarrollarse mediante la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en una bodeguita donde ofrece a la venta variedad de productos, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de variedad de productos de primera necesidad para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos lo que va a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Martha Genoveva is 40 years old and in a civil marriage. She has two dependent children and owns in her own home in the district of Nueva Arica, a rural area that has developed through agriculture, commerce and cattle ranching. It is located located in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

She makes a living selling basic necessities in a small store where she offers a variety of products. Her business is located in her home. She has requested this loan to purchase a variety of basic necessities to supply her business and in this manner generate higher revenues and improve the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of basic essentials to supply her business.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es:
Joel tiene 31 años de edad, tiene 01 hijo dependiente, vive en casa propia que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Colasay, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de café en buen estado, además se dedica al cultivo de pan llevar como son maíz, yuca, etc. y se desempeña como peón agrícola en la zona realizando trabajos en diversos cultivos. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El destino del crédito es para invertir en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café y así poder adquirir una utilidad aceptable para que mejore su nivel de ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Joel, age 31, has one dependent child.  He lives in his own house, which is in the Colasay district.  The community devotes itself to agriculture and livestock.  It is in the Jaén province in the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru.

He works in agriculture, and he has coffee crops that are in good condition.  He also grows food crops like corn and yucca, etc.  He also works as a farm day worker in the area by working with various crops.

He will use the loan to buy compost and fertilizer for the maintenance of his coffee crop.  This way he will be able to get an acceptable profit in order to improve his level of earnings, and, therefore, improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer for the maintenance of his coffee crop.

loans.name: Miriam Del Socorro

texts.es:
Miriam es una joven entusiasta y con un gran corazón que la impulsa a ayudar a las demás personas, por eso escogió estudiar Química y Farmacia, porque está aprendiendo lo que le apasiona y gusta, ahora cursa su último año de dicha carrera la cual espera poder graduarse con ansias para desempeñarse como farmacéutica y al mismo tiempo poner en práctica sus conocimientos adquiridos en todos estos años.
Con la esperanza en alto Miriam solicita el crédito para el pago de sus cursos de titulación de su carrera el cual le ayudara a obtener su título y del mismo modo tendrá mayores oportunidades de trabajo. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento que le proporcionara cumplir sus metas. Miriam tiene como metas poder abrir su propia farmacia.
texts.en:
Miriam is an enthusiastic young woman with a big heart that drives her to help others. That is why she chose to study Chemistry and Pharmaceutics. She is learning what she likes and is passionate about. Now she is in her last year of her major and she hopes to be able to graduate and is eager to start working as a pharmacist and put her knowledge acquired all these years into practice.

With high hopes, Miriam is asking for the loan to pay for her graduation courses so she can get her degree and have more work opportunities. She is putting her trust in the loan to help her meet her goals. Miriam's goal is to be able to open her own pharmacy.

loans.use: to pay for a graduation course.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.en: Andrea is requesting this loan because he wants to buy fertilizers for his plantations. According to him, he's been doing much better financially this past year, and he praises his lenders for their recent well-being.

loans.use: to  buy fertilizers for his plantations.

loans.name: Melquiades

texts.es:
Melquiades tiene 63 años de edad, es soltero, sin hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia en una zona rural del distrito de Nueva Arica, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Melquiades se dedica a brindar servicio de jornaleria desde hace 35 años, el presta este servicio en su distrito y en los alrededores del mismo. Él solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo; compra de una mochila para fumigar; esto le servira para mejorar sus servicios a los agricultores ya que le dará un valor agregado a su servicio. De esta forma, podrá captar un número mayor de clientes, mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejora en la calidad de su vida.
texts.en:
Meliquiades is 63 years old, single, and without dependent children. He owns his own home in a rural area of the district of Nueva Arica, in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru. His community is dedicated mainly to agriculture, trade, and livestock. 

Meliquiades has been a day labourer for 35 years, providing this service in his district and surrounding areas. He has requested a loan to invest in fixed assets, buying a pesticide sprayer backpack which will improve his services to farmers, adding value to his service. In this way, he can attract more customers, higher revenues, higher profits, and an improvement in his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a pesticide sprayer backpack and improve his services
